headline: Samsara (IOT): Durable AI-Driven Growth With Room to Run
summary: Samsara Inc. (NYSE:IOT) is one of the Best AI Stocks to Buy under $50. On December 22, Evercore highlighted Microsoft, Salesforce, and Oracle as its top enterprise software picks for 2026. Besides these names, Samsara Inc. was highlighted as a favored idea, alongside Intuit and Snowflake. According to the analysts, these names pair secular AI […]
